author: midwife03
title: Perfect Location
text: We travelled as a couple to Rome for the first time and found the hotel to be ideally located for all of the major sights. We had initially thought about a sightseeing bus to get around but we soon realised everything was within walking distance. The furthest away being the Coliseum- 45 min walk. We chose a Deluxe room and that was lovely but small- wouldn't have liked the standard ones for size. It was well equipped with mini bar, kettle, hair drier, iron, gowns and slippers. Breakfast was lovely and staff very helpful. Highly recommend!!
